nodes.bodyText: There was intense debate in the metric specs about this. The rationale (for good or ill) was that having different instruments that reflect the different semantics of the counting was valuable for instrumentation, to make it very clear what sort of counting you were doing. We went the opposite way from OpenCensus, which (I think?) has one instrument for everything, and lots of options.
